config-element.description: This configuration element contains defaults for which host to deploy VMs onto, which VM folder to deploy VMs into, which datastore to deploy VMs into, etc.

att.name: defaultVmFolder
att.description: Default VM folder to install VMs into

att.name: defaultEsxiHost
att.description: Default ESXi host to install VMs onto

att.name: defaultDatastore
att.description: Default datastore to install VMs into

att.name: defaultNetwork
att.description: Default network to plug VMs into

att.name: defaultResourcePool
att.description: Default resource pool to install VMs into

att.name: defaultVram
att.description: Default amount of vRAM in MB

att.name: defaultVdisk
att.description: Default size of virtual disk in GB

att.name: defaultThinProvision
att.description: Default policy whether to thin provision virtual disks (true=thin, false=thick)

att.name: defaultDelayBetweenVms
att.description: Default amount of time to wait between creating VMs (in seconds)

att.name: defaultGuestOs
att.description: Default guest OS that will be installed into new VM2
